comments.comments_text: Goal! Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) neatly controls a decent pass from Andrew Robertson. He looks up and smashes an unstoppable drive into the left side of the goal from the edge of the box. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Andrew Robertson (Liverpool) lifts the ball into the box from the corner, but one of the defending players gets there first to head it clear. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Liverpool.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Allan (Everton) was quite harsh and Paul Tierney didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Richarlison puts Demarai Gray (Everton) in the clear with just the keeper to beat. He takes his shot early from the edge of the box and scores beautifully into the right side of the goal. 1:2.
